articles.title: Fascinating Alaska sky spiral caused by Elon Musk SpaceX rocket fuel dump - HT Tech
articles.description: The timing of the SpaceX rocket fuel dump and the fact that it was a polar launch made the blue spiral visible over a large swath of Alaska.
articles.content: Northern lights enthusiasts got a surprise mixed in with the green bands of light dancing in the Alaska skies: A light baby blue spiral resembling a galaxy appeared amid the aurora for a few minutes.… [+2169 chars]
